name: ROOT OUT (kniocra, PixelShell, Honosoo, Citris, Aceien)
name_original: ROOT OUT (kniocra, PixelShell, Honosoo, Citris, Aceien)
description:
Discover the roots of your family and take revenge.

A 2D hack&slash game made for Global Game Jam 2023 in 48 hours.

CREDITS:

Eren Mert Özen (Citris) - Programmer

Emirhan Hasırcı (Honoso) - Programmer

Deniz Vural (PixelShell) - UI/Programmer

Hazal Vural (kniocra) - Background Art

Emre Aslan Öztürk (Aceien) - Character Art
